title: So uh. Ornn's reveal just showed up.
body:
https://www.facebook.com/leagueoflegends/videos/10159368696165556/

Well this is interesting. He IS a giant ram! I had a theory a while back that the 'Unbreakable Door' that Braum uses as a shield may have been forged by Ornn. He *IS* the Mountainsmith after all.

replies.body:
There are many champions with cc.

There are many champions with dashes.

Only Ornn summons a giant ram and then crashes in to said Ram to cc you.
We have braum, Ornn, Olaf, now we just need a manly mid lane and adc for a full Armstrong team.
There will never be a manly Armstrong ADC, the whole role revolves around being a pussy XD
Throwing Axe (maybe throwing hammer?) sounds like a good weapon for a manly-man ADC design. Olaf has that theme too, so it's probably difficult to make him feel different, though.

Well actually Dravens weapons are referred to as axes,so we do have an axe thrower in the game.

And in general I don't think that Olaf is only defined by his ability to throw axes,he is more defined by being our only viking in the game.
Olaf will probably get a VGU so they might...axe his current throwing axe ability.
Maaaaaaybe a sling, anyone that brings a sling to battle against guns and bows is pretty ballsy.
Pentakill mordekaiser?

I am SO Excited.
That ult looks SO Awesome.
I was hoping for something with a pretty high skill ceiling, and I feel like his Giant ram is gonna provide just that.

Edit: Full reveal went up, fully hyped now.
http://www.surrenderat20.net/2017/08/champion-reveal-ornn-fire-below-mountain.html

when i first started reading the ult descrip i was like UGH, same as annie and ivern

but nope

Epic voice

"Is it on? Name's Ornn. No further pleasantries needed."

"I now like you less. I did not think that was possible."

I love him.
Freaking Ron Swanson the blacksmith

Your father-in-law is a giant ram smith?
I do wonder if he will just be able to keep purchasing potions non stop with his passive and be the sustain king of top lane XD

He can't purchase potions. He is a Blacksmith not a Alchemist 

:)

What about Wards? Really glad to hear potions aren't purchasable since low sustain laners would cry whenever they went against him, but I'm a little worried about him dominating top lane vision especially in pro play.

> [{quoted}](name=Skullthorn,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=gTm6Gppn,comment-id=000800010000,timestamp=2017-08-07T18:20:48.561+0000)

> What about Wards? Really glad to hear potions aren't purchasable since low sustain laners would cry whenever they went against him, but I'm a little worried about him dominating top lane vision especially in pro play.

He has to purchase wards from the store as well. Rest assured, he's not too happy about that.
So basically he can't buy consumables globally?
I wonder if he has a line like "These petty trinkets are all I come here to buy from you"
but why can't singed make his own potions then? or would they be poisonous?
He makes Toxins, not potions.
It's probably better to start refillable potion, and upgrade to corrupting potion in lane for a refill.

I don't think Riot would even allow this.
The point wasn't to give Ornn infinite sustain (because he doesn't have to back). The point was simply to allow him to shop for items without backing,
Yeah, Reav3 already said he can't buy potions, so he probably can't upgrade potions either.

This guy looks like a lot of fun to play.

I like the fact he can bust through player built walls.

That ult looks crazy since he can redirect it. I'm excited to see the numbers that he has along with the unique items teammates can craft as well.

Think the item will be generic to the role or a unique one for each champ?
How it works is that a bunch of current items in the game can be upgraded a tier further if Ornn is on your team. Each player can only upgrade one item per game though.
Will we be told what Items can be or we gonna have to find that out ourselves?
Players in a game with Ornn will have a "Ornn's Shop" Tab in the shop UI
What upgrades will the items get? Just better stats or a new effect?
Better stats and upgraded effects, but not new effects.

Explain to me how exactly this won't make Ornn a required champion on teams? I can see having an extra tier of items being detrimental to the health of the game, especially since I can see it creating scenarios where he must be played on both teams so the your team doesn't lose a stat advantage. This seems like it will be the Alacrity Enchantment all over again. I don't think one champion should benefit the team so insanely like this sounds like he will.

The upgrades cost money, so the only time it becomes a advantage is in a game where everyone gets to 6 items, which isn't super often. There are many champions that give your team huge advantages in the late game (most hyper carries do)
Any reason to not give certain items an upgrade? Mainly speaking about Lethality and AS focused items like Ghostblade or Bork.

https://twitter.com/Squad5lol/status/894653527976427520

Are these all the items or just some examples?  I really hope for at least 2 mage options (especially since Rab is such a late game item for mages now).
Is it all players in the game, or just players on Ornn's team, because the way this is worded makes me think it's everyone.
Just Ornn's Team
Can't wait to upgrade Ohmwrecker :)
Explodes target enemy turret, regardless of health.
After three weeby champions in a row, a gruff manly dwarf with supportive utility? This pleases me greatly.
Rakan and Xayah aren't weeby. ._.
Uhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhhh
Yasuo, Ahri, Kayn, and a few other Champions are weeby... but Xyaha and Rakan just strike me as a standard teenage couple. Nothing about them really screams Japanese to me.

Anything that appeals to today's demographic = weeby.
